risks.divergence_summary: Company policy allows 90 days vs regulation requires 30 days
risks.conflicting_policy_excerpt: Customer data will be retained for 90 days after deletion request
risks.new_rule_excerpt: All customer data must be deleted within 30 days of request
risks.recommendation: Update data retention policy to comply with 30-day requirement

risks.conflicting_policy_excerpt: Manual review required for all deletion requests
risks.new_rule_excerpt: Companies must provide automated deletion mechanisms
risks.recommendation: Implement automated deletion system for customer requests
